caption.p: (a) Changes in the Mn K-edge XANES in Co 1.5Mn 1.5O 4 catalysts with applied potential in 1 M KOH electrolyte. (b) Results of linear combination analysis. (c) Periodic changes in the X-ray absorption at 7722.5 eV (Co K-edge) and 6553.0 eV (Mn K-edge) corresponding to changes in the Co and Mn oxidation state. (d) Corresponding CV. Reproduced with permission from ref ( 519). Copyright 2019 American Chemical Society.
